1. Connect the sensor array's GND pin to a ground pin on the Arduino.
2. Connect the sensor array's 5V pin to a power pin on the Arduino (e.g. the 3.3V or 5V pin).
3. Connect the sensor array's OUT1, OUT2, OUT3, OUT4, and OUT5 pins to analog input pins on the Arduino (e.g. A0, A1, A2, etc.).
